    • drawElementInner

      void drawElementInner(ScreenInfoBook gui, net.minecraft.client.gui.GuiGraphics guiGraphics, int x, int y, int width, int height, int page, int mx, int my, AdvancedButton button)
      Draw the reward.
      Parameters:
      gui - The gui.
      guiGraphics - The gui graphics object.
      x - Start X.
      y - Start Y.
      width - Max width.
      height - Max height.
      page - Current page.
      mx - Mouse X.
      my - Mouse Y.
      button - The button of this reward.
